entry.name: Struggle
entry.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

entry.name: Pound
entry.description: Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.

entry.name: Karate Chop
entry.description: A chopping attack with a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: DoubleSlap
entry.description: Repeatedly slaps the foe 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Comet Punch
entry.description: Repeatedly punches the foe 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Mega Punch
entry.description: A strong punch thrown with incredible power.

entry.name: Pay Day
entry.description: Throws coins at the foe. Money is recovered after.

entry.name: Fire Punch
entry.description: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.

entry.name: Ice Punch
entry.description: An icy punch that may freeze the foe.

entry.name: ThunderPunch
entry.description: An electrified punch that may paralyze the foe.

entry.name: Scratch
entry.description: Scratches the foe with sharp claws.

entry.name: ViceGrip
entry.description: Grips the foe with large and powerful pincers.

entry.name: Guillotine
entry.description: A powerful pincer attack that may cause fainting.

entry.name: Razor Wind
entry.description: A 2-turn move that strikes the foe on the 2nd turn.

entry.name: Swords Dance
entry.description: A fighting dance that sharply raises ATTACK.

entry.name: Cut
entry.description: Cuts the foe with sharp scythes, claws, etc.

entry.name: Gust
entry.description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

entry.name: Wing Attack
entry.description: Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.

entry.name: Whirlwind
entry.description: Blows away the foe with wind and ends the battle.

entry.name: Fly
entry.description: Flies up on the first turn, then strikes the next turn.

entry.name: Bind
entry.description: Binds and squeezes the foe for 2 to 5 turns.

entry.name: Slam
entry.description: Slams the foe with a long tail, vine, etc.

entry.name: Vine Whip
entry.description: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines.

entry.name: Stomp
entry.description: Stomps the enemy with a big foot. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Double Kick
entry.description: A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.

entry.name: Mega Kick
entry.description: An extremely powerful kick with intense force.

entry.name: Jump Kick
entry.description: A strong jumping kick. May miss and hurt the kicker.

entry.name: Rolling Kick
entry.description: A fast kick delivered from a rapid spin.

entry.name: Sand-Attack
entry.description: Reduces the foe's accuracy by hurling sand in its face.

entry.name: Headbutt
entry.description: A ramming attack that may cause flinching.

entry.name: Horn Attack
entry.description: Jabs the foe with sharp horns.

entry.name: Fury Attack
entry.description: Jabs the foe 2 to 5 times with sharp horns, etc.

entry.name: Horn Drill
entry.description: A one-hit KO attack that uses a horn like a drill.

entry.name: Tackle
entry.description: Charges the foe with a full- body tackle.

entry.name: Body Slam
entry.description: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

entry.name: Wrap
entry.description: Wraps and squeezes the foe 2 to 5 times with vines, etc.

entry.name: Take Down
entry.description: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.

entry.name: Thrash
entry.description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

entry.name: Double-Edge
entry.description: A life-risking tackle that also hurts the user.

entry.name: Tail Whip
entry.description: Wags the tail to lower the foe's DEFENSE.

entry.name: Poison Sting
entry.description: A toxic attack with barbs, etc., that may poison.

entry.name: Twineedle
entry.description: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.

entry.name: Pin Missile
entry.description: Sharp pins are fired to strike 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Leer
entry.description: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.

entry.name: Bite
entry.description: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Growl
entry.description: Growls cutely to reduce the foe's ATTACK.

entry.name: Roar
entry.description: Makes the foe flee to end the battle.

entry.name: Sing
entry.description: A soothing song lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

entry.name: Supersonic
entry.description: Emits bizarre sound waves that may confuse the foe.

entry.name: SonicBoom
entry.description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 20 HP damage.

entry.name: Disable
entry.description: Psychically disables one of the foe's moves.

entry.name: Acid
entry.description: Sprays a hide-melting acid. May lower DEFENSE.

entry.name: Ember
entry.description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

entry.name: Flamethrower
entry.description: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

entry.name: Mist
entry.description: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.

entry.name: Water Gun
entry.description: Squirts water to attack the foe.

entry.name: Hydro Pump
entry.description: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.

entry.name: Surf
entry.description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

entry.name: Ice Beam
entry.description: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.

entry.name: Blizzard
entry.description: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.

entry.name: Psybeam
entry.description: Fires a peculiar ray that may confuse the foe.

entry.name: BubbleBeam
entry.description: Forcefully sprays bubbles that may lower SPEED.

entry.name: Aurora Beam
entry.description: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.

entry.name: Hyper Beam
entry.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

entry.name: Peck
entry.description: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.

entry.name: Drill Peck
entry.description: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.

entry.name: Submission
entry.description: A reckless body slam that also hurts the user.

entry.name: Low Kick
entry.description: A kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.

entry.name: Counter
entry.description: Retaliates any physical hit with double the power.

entry.name: Seismic Toss
entry.description: Inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

entry.name: Strength
entry.description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

entry.name: Absorb
entry.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

entry.name: Mega Drain
entry.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

entry.name: Leech Seed
entry.description: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.

entry.name: Growth
entry.description: Forces the body to grow and heightens SP. ATK.

entry.name: Razor Leaf
entry.description: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: SolarBeam
entry.description: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.

entry.name: PoisonPowder
entry.description: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.

entry.name: Stun Spore
entry.description: Scatters a powder that may paralyze the foe.

entry.name: Sleep Powder
entry.description: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.

entry.name: Petal Dance
entry.description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

entry.name: String Shot
entry.description: Binds the foe with string to reduce its SPEED.

entry.name: Dragon Rage
entry.description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.

entry.name: Fire Spin
entry.description: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.

entry.name: ThunderShock
entry.description: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

entry.name: Thunderbolt
entry.description: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

entry.name: Thunder Wave
entry.description: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.

entry.name: Thunder
entry.description: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.

entry.name: Rock Throw
entry.description: Throws small rocks to strike the foe.

entry.name: Earthquake
entry.description: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.

entry.name: Fissure
entry.description: A one-hit KO move that drops the foe in a fissure.

entry.name: Dig
entry.description: Digs underground the first turn and strikes next turn.

entry.name: Toxic
entry.description: Poisons the foe with an intensifying toxin.

entry.name: Confusion
entry.description: A psychic attack that may cause confusion.

entry.name: Psychic
entry.description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

entry.name: Hypnosis
entry.description: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.

entry.name: Meditate
entry.description: Meditates in a peaceful fashion to raise ATTACK.

entry.name: Agility
entry.description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost SPEED.

entry.name: Quick Attack
entry.description: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

entry.name: Rage
entry.description: Raises the user's ATTACK every time it is hit.

entry.name: Teleport
entry.description: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.

entry.name: Night Shade
entry.description: Inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

entry.name: Mimic
entry.description: Copies a move used by the foe during one battle.

entry.name: Screech
entry.description: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe's DEFENSE.

entry.name: Double Team
entry.description: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.

entry.name: Recover
entry.description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

entry.name: Harden
entry.description: Stiffens the body's muscles to raise DEFENSE.

entry.name: Minimize
entry.description: Minimizes the user's size to raise evasiveness.

entry.name: SmokeScreen
entry.description: Lowers the foe's accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.

entry.name: Confuse Ray
entry.description: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.

entry.name: Withdraw
entry.description: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.

entry.name: Defense Curl
entry.description: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise DEFENSE.

entry.name: Barrier
entry.description: Creates a barrier that sharply raises DEFENSE.

entry.name: Light Screen
entry.description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

entry.name: Haze
entry.description: Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.

entry.name: Reflect
entry.description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

entry.name: Focus Energy
entry.description: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Bide
entry.description: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.

entry.name: Metronome
entry.description: Waggles a finger to use any POKéMON move at random.

entry.name: Mirror Move
entry.description: Counters the foe's attack with the same move.

entry.name: Selfdestruct
entry.description: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.

entry.name: Egg Bomb
entry.description: An egg is forcibly hurled at the foe.

entry.name: Lick
entry.description: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.

entry.name: Smog
entry.description: An exhaust-gas attack that may also poison.

entry.name: Sludge
entry.description: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.

entry.name: Bone Club
entry.description: Clubs the foe with a bone. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Fire Blast
entry.description: A fiery blast that scorches all. May cause a burn.

entry.name: Waterfall
entry.description: Charges the foe with speed to climb waterfalls.

entry.name: Clamp
entry.description: Traps and squeezes the foe for 2 to 5 turns.

entry.name: Swift
entry.description: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.

entry.name: Skull Bash
entry.description: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.

entry.name: Spike Cannon
entry.description: Launches sharp spikes that strike 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Constrict
entry.description: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.

entry.name: Amnesia
entry.description: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.

entry.name: Kinesis
entry.description: Distracts the foe. May lower accuracy.

entry.name: Softboiled
entry.description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

entry.name: Hi Jump Kick
entry.description: A jumping knee kick. If it misses, the user is hurt.

entry.name: Glare
entry.description: Intimidates and frightens the foe into paralysis.

entry.name: Dream Eater
entry.description: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.

entry.name: Poison Gas
entry.description: Envelops the foe in a toxic gas that may poison.

entry.name: Barrage
entry.description: Hurls round objects at the foe 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Leech Life
entry.description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

entry.name: Lovely Kiss
entry.description: Demands a kiss with a scary face that induces sleep.

entry.name: Sky Attack
entry.description: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.

entry.name: Transform
entry.description: Alters the user's cells to become a copy of the foe.

entry.name: Bubble
entry.description: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe's SPEED.

entry.name: Dizzy Punch
entry.description: A rhythmic punch that may confuse the foe.

entry.name: Spore
entry.description: Scatters a cloud of spores that always induce sleep.

entry.name: Flash
entry.description: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.

entry.name: Psywave
entry.description: Attacks with a psychic wave of varying intensity.

entry.name: Splash
entry.description: It's just a splash... Has no effect whatsoever.

entry.name: Acid Armor
entry.description: Liquifies the user's body to sharply raise DEFENSE.

entry.name: Crabhammer
entry.description: Hammers with a pincer. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Explosion
entry.description: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.

entry.name: Fury Swipes
entry.description: Rakes the foe with sharp claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Bonemerang
entry.description: Throws a bone boomerang that strikes twice.

entry.name: Rest
entry.description: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.

entry.name: Rock Slide
entry.description: Large boulders are hurled. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Hyper Fang
entry.description: Attacks with sharp fangs. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Sharpen
entry.description: Reduces the polygon count and raises ATTACK.

entry.name: Conversion
entry.description: Changes the user's type into an own move's type.

entry.name: Tri Attack
entry.description: Fires three types of beams at the same time.

entry.name: Super Fang
entry.description: Attacks with sharp fangs and cuts half the foe's HP.

entry.name: Slash
entry.description: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Substitute
entry.description: Creates a decoy using 1/4 of the user's maximum HP.

entry.name: Struggle
entry.description: Used only if all PP are gone. Also hurts the user a little.

entry.name: Sketch
entry.description: Copies the foe's last move permanently.

entry.name: Triple Kick
entry.description: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.

entry.name: Thief
entry.description: While attacking, it may steal the foe's held item.

entry.name: Spider Web
entry.description: Ensnares the foe to stop it from fleeing or switching.

entry.name: Mind Reader
entry.description: Senses the foe's action to ensure the next move's hit.

entry.name: Nightmare
entry.description: Inflicts 1/4 damage on a sleeping foe every turn.

entry.name: Flame Wheel
entry.description: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.

entry.name: Snore
entry.description: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.

entry.name: Curse
entry.description: A move that functions differently for GHOSTS.

entry.name: Flail
entry.description: Inflicts more damage when the user's HP is down.

entry.name: Conversion 2
entry.description: Makes the user resistant to the last attack's type.

entry.name: Aeroblast
entry.description: Launches a vacuumed blast. High critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Cotton Spore
entry.description: Spores cling to the foe, sharply reducing SPEED.

entry.name: Reversal
entry.description: Inflicts more damage when the user's HP is down.

entry.name: Spite
entry.description: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe's last move.

entry.name: Powder Snow
entry.description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause freezing.

entry.name: Protect
entry.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

entry.name: Mach Punch
entry.description: A punch is thrown at wicked speed to strike first.

entry.name: Scary Face
entry.description: Frightens with a scary face to sharply reduce SPEED.

entry.name: Faint Attack
entry.description: Draws the foe close, then strikes without fail.

entry.name: Sweet Kiss
entry.description: Demands a kiss with a cute look. May cause confusion.

entry.name: Belly Drum
entry.description: Maximizes ATTACK while sacrificing HP.

entry.name: Sludge Bomb
entry.description: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.

entry.name: Mud-Slap
entry.description: Hurls mud in the foe's face to reduce its accuracy.

entry.name: Octazooka
entry.description: Fires a lump of ink to damage and cut accuracy.

entry.name: Spikes
entry.description: Sets spikes that hurt a foe switching out.

entry.name: Zap Cannon
entry.description: Powerful and sure to cause paralysis, but inaccurate.

entry.name: Foresight
entry.description: Negates the foe's efforts to heighten evasiveness.

entry.name: Destiny Bond
entry.description: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.

entry.name: Perish Song
entry.description: Any POKéMON hearing this song faints in 3 turns.

entry.name: Icy Wind
entry.description: A chilling attack that lowers the foe's SPEED.

entry.name: Detect
entry.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

entry.name: Bone Rush
entry.description: Strikes the foe with a bone in hand 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Lock-On
entry.description: Locks on to the foe to ensure the next move hits.

entry.name: Outrage
entry.description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

entry.name: Sandstorm
entry.description: Causes a sandstorm that rages for several turns.

entry.name: Giga Drain
entry.description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

entry.name: Endure
entry.description: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

entry.name: Charm
entry.description: Charms the foe and sharply reduces its ATTACK.

entry.name: Rollout
entry.description: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.

entry.name: False Swipe
entry.description: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

entry.name: Swagger
entry.description: Confuses the foe, but also sharply raises ATTACK.

entry.name: Milk Drink
entry.description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

entry.name: Spark
entry.description: An electrified tackle that may paralyze the foe.

entry.name: Fury Cutter
entry.description: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.

entry.name: Steel Wing
entry.description: Strikes the foe with hard wings spread wide.

entry.name: Mean Look
entry.description: Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.

entry.name: Attract
entry.description: Makes the opposite gender less likely to attack.

entry.name: Sleep Talk
entry.description: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.

entry.name: Heal Bell
entry.description: Chimes soothingly to heal all status abnormalities.

entry.name: Return
entry.description: An attack that increases in power with friendship.

entry.name: Present
entry.description: A gift in the form of a bomb. May restore HP.

entry.name: Frustration
entry.description: An attack that is stronger if the TRAINER is disliked.

entry.name: Safeguard
entry.description: A mystical force prevents all status problems.

entry.name: Pain Split
entry.description: Adds the user and foe's HP, then shares them equally.

entry.name: Sacred Fire
entry.description: A mystical fire attack that may inflict a burn.

entry.name: Magnitude
entry.description: A ground-shaking attack of random intensity.

entry.name: DynamicPunch
entry.description: Powerful and sure to cause confusion, but inaccurate.

entry.name: Megahorn
entry.description: A brutal ramming attack using out-thrust horns.

entry.name: DragonBreath
entry.description: Strikes the foe with an incredible blast of breath.

entry.name: Baton Pass
entry.description: Switches out the user while keeping effects in play.

entry.name: Encore
entry.description: Makes the foe repeat its last move over 2 to 6 turns.

entry.name: Pursuit
entry.description: Inflicts bad damage if used on a foe switching out.

entry.name: Rapid Spin
entry.description: Spins the body at high speed to strike the foe.

entry.name: Sweet Scent
entry.description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness.

entry.name: Iron Tail
entry.description: Attacks with a rock-hard tail. May lower DEFENSE.

entry.name: Metal Claw
entry.description: A claw attack that may raise the user's ATTACK.

entry.name: Vital Throw
entry.description: Makes the user's move last, but it never misses.

entry.name: Morning Sun
entry.description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

entry.name: Synthesis
entry.description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

entry.name: Moonlight
entry.description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

entry.name: Hidden Power
entry.description: The effectiveness varies with the user.

entry.name: Cross Chop
entry.description: A double-chopping attack. High critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Twister
entry.description: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

entry.name: Rain Dance
entry.description: Boosts the power of WATER- type moves for 5 turns.

entry.name: Sunny Day
entry.description: Boosts the power of FIRE- type moves for 5 turns.

entry.name: Crunch
entry.description: Crunches with sharp fangs. May lower SP. DEF.

entry.name: Mirror Coat
entry.description: Counters the foe's special attack at double the power.

entry.name: Psych Up
entry.description: Copies the foe's effects and gives to the user.

entry.name: ExtremeSpeed
entry.description: An extremely fast and powerful attack.

entry.name: AncientPower
entry.description: An attack that may raise all stats.

entry.name: Shadow Ball
entry.description: Hurls a black blob that may lower the foe's SP. DEF.

entry.name: Future Sight
entry.description: Heightens inner power to strike 2 turns later.

entry.name: Rock Smash
entry.description: A rock-crushing attack that may lower DEFENSE.

entry.name: Whirlpool
entry.description: Traps and hurts the foe in a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.

entry.name: Beat Up
entry.description: Summons party POKéMON to join in the attack.

entry.name: Fake Out
entry.description: A 1st-turn, 1st-strike move that causes flinching.

entry.name: Uproar
entry.description: Causes an uproar for 2 to 5 turns and prevents sleep.

entry.name: Stockpile
entry.description: Charges up power for up to 3 turns.

entry.name: Spit Up
entry.description: Releases stockpiled power the more the better.

entry.name: Swallow
entry.description: Absorbs stockpiled power and restores HP.

entry.name: Heat Wave
entry.description: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.

entry.name: Hail
entry.description: Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.

entry.name: Torment
entry.description: Torments the foe and stops successive use of a move.

entry.name: Flatter
entry.description: Confuses the foe, but raises its SP. ATK.

entry.name: Will-O-Wisp
entry.description: Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire.

entry.name: Memento
entry.description: The user faints and lowers the foe's abilities.

entry.name: Facade
entry.description: Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

entry.name: Focus Punch
entry.description: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.

entry.name: SmellingSalt
entry.description: Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them.

entry.name: Follow Me
entry.description: Draws attention to make foes attack only the user.

entry.name: Nature Power
entry.description: The type of attack varies depending on the location.

entry.name: Charge
entry.description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

entry.name: Taunt
entry.description: Taunts the foe into only using attack moves.

entry.name: Helping Hand
entry.description: Boosts the power of the recipient's moves.

entry.name: Trick
entry.description: Tricks the foe into trading held items.

entry.name: Role Play
entry.description: Mimics the target and copies its special ability.

entry.name: Wish
entry.description: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.

entry.name: Assist
entry.description: Attacks randomly with one of the partner's moves.

entry.name: Ingrain
entry.description: Lays roots that restore HP. The user can't switch out.

entry.name: Superpower
entry.description: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.

entry.name: Magic Coat
entry.description: Reflects special effects back to the attacker.

entry.name: Recycle
entry.description: Recycles a used item for one more use.

entry.name: Revenge
entry.description: An attack that gains power if injured by the foe.

entry.name: Brick Break
entry.description: Destroys barriers such as REFLECT and causes damage.

entry.name: Yawn
entry.description: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping next turn.

entry.name: Knock Off
entry.description: Knocks down the foe's held item to prevent its use.

entry.name: Endeavor
entry.description: Gains power if the user's HP is lower than the foe's HP.

entry.name: Eruption
entry.description: The higher the user's HP, the more damage caused.

entry.name: Skill Swap
entry.description: The user swaps special abilities with the target.

entry.name: Imprison
entry.description: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

entry.name: Refresh
entry.description: Heals poisoning, paralysis, or a burn.

entry.name: Grudge
entry.description: If the user faints, deletes the PP of the final move.

entry.name: Snatch
entry.description: Steals the effects of the move the foe uses next.

entry.name: Secret Power
entry.description: An attack with effects that vary by location.

entry.name: Dive
entry.description: Dives underwater the first turn and strikes next turn.

entry.name: Arm Thrust
entry.description: Straight-arm punches that strike the foe 2 to 5 times.

entry.name: Camouflage
entry.description: Alters the POKéMON's type depending on the location.

entry.name: Tail Glow
entry.description: Flashes a light that sharply raises SP. ATK.

entry.name: Luster Purge
entry.description: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower SP. DEF.

entry.name: Mist Ball
entry.description: Attacks with a flurry of down. May lower SP. ATK.

entry.name: FeatherDance
entry.description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.

entry.name: Teeter Dance
entry.description: Confuses all POKéMON on the scene.

entry.name: Blaze Kick
entry.description: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.

entry.name: Mud Sport
entry.description: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.

entry.name: Ice Ball
entry.description: A 5-turn attack that gains power on successive hits.

entry.name: Needle Arm
entry.description: Attacks with thorny arms. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Slack Off
entry.description: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.

entry.name: Hyper Voice
entry.description: A loud attack that uses sound waves to injure.

entry.name: Poison Fang
entry.description: A sharp-fanged attack. May badly poison the foe.

entry.name: Crush Claw
entry.description: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower DEFENSE.

entry.name: Blast Burn
entry.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

entry.name: Hydro Cannon
entry.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

entry.name: Meteor Mash
entry.description: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise ATTACK.

entry.name: Astonish
entry.description: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.

entry.name: Weather Ball
entry.description: The move's type and power change with the weather.

entry.name: Aromatherapy
entry.description: Heals all status problems with a soothing scent.

entry.name: Fake Tears
entry.description: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe's SP. DEF.

entry.name: Air Cutter
entry.description: Hacks with razorlike wind. High critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Overheat
entry.description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

entry.name: Odor Sleuth
entry.description: Negates the foe's efforts to heighten evasiveness.

entry.name: Rock Tomb
entry.description: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts SPEED.

entry.name: Silver Wind
entry.description: A powdery attack that may raise abilities.

entry.name: Metal Sound
entry.description: Emits a horrible screech that sharply lowers SP. DEF.

entry.name: GrassWhistle
entry.description: Lulls the foe into sleep with a pleasant melody.

entry.name: Tickle
entry.description: Makes the foe laugh to lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.

entry.name: Cosmic Power
entry.description: Raises DEFENSE and SP. DEF with a mystic power.

entry.name: Water Spout
entry.description: Inflicts more damage if the user's HP is high.

entry.name: Signal Beam
entry.description: A strange beam attack that may confuse the foe.

entry.name: Shadow Punch
entry.description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

entry.name: Extrasensory
entry.description: Attacks with a peculiar power. May cause flinching.

entry.name: Sky Uppercut
entry.description: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.

entry.name: Sand Tomb
entry.description: Traps and hurts the foe in quicksand for 2 to 5 turns.

entry.name: Sheer Cold
entry.description: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

entry.name: Muddy Water
entry.description: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

entry.name: Bullet Seed
entry.description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

entry.name: Aerial Ace
entry.description: An extremely speedy and unavoidable attack.

entry.name: Icicle Spear
entry.description: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

entry.name: Iron Defense
entry.description: Hardens the body's surface to sharply raise DEFENSE.

entry.name: Block
entry.description: Blocks the foe's way to prevent escape.

entry.name: Howl
entry.description: Howls to raise the spirit and boosts ATTACK.

entry.name: Dragon Claw
entry.description: Slashes the foe with sharp claws.

entry.name: Frenzy Plant
entry.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

entry.name: Bulk Up
entry.description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

entry.name: Bounce
entry.description: Bounces up, then down the next turn. May paralyze.

entry.name: Mud Shot
entry.description: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.

entry.name: Poison Tail
entry.description: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

entry.name: Covet
entry.description: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.

entry.name: Volt Tackle
entry.description: A life-risking tackle that slightly hurts the user.

entry.name: Magical Leaf
entry.description: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

entry.name: Water Sport
entry.description: The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire.

entry.name: Calm Mind
entry.description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

entry.name: Leaf Blade
entry.description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Dragon Dance
entry.description: A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED.

entry.name: Rock Blast
entry.description: Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.

entry.name: Shock Wave
entry.description: A fast and unavoidable electric attack.

entry.name: Water Pulse
entry.description: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe

entry.name: Doom Desire
entry.description: Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later.

entry.name: Psycho Boost
entry.description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

entry.name: Roost
entry.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

entry.name: Gravity
entry.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, disabling Levitation and moves involving flying.

entry.name: Miracle Eye
entry.description: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

entry.name: Wake-Up Slap
entry.description: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

entry.name: Hammer Arm
entry.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

entry.name: Gyro Ball
entry.description: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The faster the opponent and the slower the user, the greater the damage.

entry.name: Healing Wish
entry.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

entry.name: Brine
entry.description: If the foe's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

entry.name: Natural Gift
entry.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

entry.name: Feint
entry.description: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

entry.name: Pluck
entry.description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

entry.name: Tailwind
entry.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.

entry.name: Acupressure
entry.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

entry.name: Metal Burst
entry.description: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.

entry.name: U-turn
entry.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

entry.name: Close Combat
entry.description: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

entry.name: Payback
entry.description: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.

entry.name: Assurance
entry.description: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

entry.name: Embargo
entry.description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

entry.name: Fling
entry.description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

entry.name: Psycho Shift
entry.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

entry.name: Trump Card
entry.description: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.

entry.name: Heal Block
entry.description: The user prevents the foe from using any HP-recovery moves for five turns.

entry.name: Wring Out
entry.description: The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack's power.

entry.name: Power Trick
entry.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

entry.name: Gastro Acid
entry.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe's ability.

entry.name: Lucky Chant
entry.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.

entry.name: Me First
entry.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe's intended move with greater power.

entry.name: Copycat
entry.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

entry.name: Power Swap
entry.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the foe.

entry.name: Guard Swap
entry.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

entry.name: Punishment
entry.description: This attack's power increases the more the foe has powered up with stat changes.

entry.name: Last Resort
entry.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

entry.name: Worry Seed
entry.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

entry.name: Sucker Punch
entry.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

entry.name: Toxic Spikes
entry.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe's feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

entry.name: Heart Swap
entry.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

entry.name: Aqua Ring
entry.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

entry.name: Magnet Rise
entry.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

entry.name: Flare Blitz
entry.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

entry.name: Force Palm
entry.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

entry.name: Aura Sphere
entry.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

entry.name: Rock Polish
entry.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

entry.name: Poison Jab
entry.description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

entry.name: Dark Pulse
entry.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

entry.name: Night Slash
entry.description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Aqua Tail
entry.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

entry.name: Seed Bomb
entry.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

entry.name: Air Slash
entry.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch

entry.name: X-Scissor
entry.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

entry.name: Bug Buzz
entry.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

entry.name: Dragon Pulse
entry.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

entry.name: Dragon Rush
entry.description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

entry.name: Power Gem
entry.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

entry.name: Drain Punch
entry.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

entry.name: Vacuum Wave
entry.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

entry.name: Focus Blast
entry.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

entry.name: Energy Ball
entry.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

entry.name: Brave Bird
entry.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

entry.name: Earth Power
entry.description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

entry.name: Switcheroo
entry.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

entry.name: Giga Impact
entry.description: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

entry.name: Nasty Plot
entry.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

entry.name: Bullet Punch
entry.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

entry.name: Avalanche
entry.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

entry.name: Ice Shard
entry.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first

entry.name: Shadow Claw
entry.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Thunder Fang
entry.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe become paralyzed.

entry.name: Ice Fang
entry.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

entry.name: Fire Fang
entry.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe sustain a burn.

entry.name: Shadow Sneak
entry.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

entry.name: Mud Bomb
entry.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

entry.name: Psycho Cut
entry.description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Zen Headbutt
entry.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

entry.name: Mirror Shot
entry.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

entry.name: Flash Cannon
entry.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

entry.name: Rock Climb
entry.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

entry.name: Defog
entry.description: Obstacles are moved, reducing the foe's evasion stat. It can also be used to clear deep fog, etc.

entry.name: Trick Room
entry.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

entry.name: Draco Meteor
entry.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

entry.name: Discharge
entry.description: A flare of electricityis released to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

entry.name: Lava Plume
entry.description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

entry.name: Leaf Storm
entry.description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

entry.name: Power Whip
entry.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

entry.name: Rock Wrecker
entry.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

entry.name: Cross Poison
entry.description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Gunk Shot
entry.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

entry.name: Iron Head
entry.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

entry.name: Magnet Bomb
entry.description: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

entry.name: Stone Edge
entry.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Captivate
entry.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

entry.name: Stealth Rock
entry.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

entry.name: Grass Knot
entry.description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

entry.name: Chatter
entry.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

entry.name: Judgment
entry.description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

entry.name: Bug Bite
entry.description: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

entry.name: Charge Beam
entry.description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.

entry.name: Wood Hammer
entry.description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

entry.name: Aqua Jet
entry.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

entry.name: Attack Order
entry.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Defend Order
entry.description: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

entry.name: Heal Order
entry.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

entry.name: Head Smash
entry.description: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

entry.name: Double Hit
entry.description: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

entry.name: Roar of Time
entry.description: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

entry.name: Spacial Rend
entry.description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

entry.name: Lunar Dance
entry.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

entry.name: Crush Grip
entry.description: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

entry.name: Magma Storm
entry.description: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

entry.name: Dark Void
entry.description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

entry.name: Seed Flare
entry.description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

entry.name: Ominous Wind
entry.description: The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

entry.name: Shadow Force
entry.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect.
